tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  HILARIOUS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Gray is probably one of the best profs UNB has! He is very knowledgeable and genuinely wants his students to succeed. Be prepared to read and a fair amount of work but it\'s not tedious work. I\'m probably the worst procrastinator in history & I actually found myself finishing the assignments way before they were due.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Though not a bad professor per se, his grading scheme is completely broken. It\'s like he\'s trying to introduce unnecessary difficulty, handing out less than good grades not because student\'s didn\'t try, but because mathematically it was impossible for them to succeed. I don\'t get his motivations at all.

Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Great professor. Crystal clear, insightful, and entertaining lectures from which I learned a lot. The workload was nothing to sneeze at, and by no means does he grade lightly, but assignments are nonetheless thoroughly enjoyable. Very friendly guy.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: He gives really fun and creative assignments. He likes to let you be artistic and explore what you have learned through a channel that suits you. Extremely intelligent man-he knows his stuff.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: When i started this year, i hated him, thought he was my 2nd worst teacher, turns out, he just has to warm up to you, once the creative assignment was out and the essay came out he has been the most helpful teacher and im excited to go to all of his classes cant wait to take his class again next term :D

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Is an entertaining lecturing and connects well with the students. He comes off as an easy marker until you get an essay/test back and he craps all over it. Take his class but be prepared to go the extra mile.
